response.original_title: Doobie Bros. - Toulouse Street - Quadio Blu-Ray
response.overview: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame® and Vocal Group Hall of Fame® inductees The Doobie Brothers really hit their stride on sophomore full-length TOULOUSE STREET. After landing in July 1972, it climbed to #21 on the Billboard 200. It also took flight as the first album to showcase a solid two-drummer foundation with the addition of Michael Hossack accompanying John Hartman. Among many highlights, opener “Listen To The Music” ranks among their most popular material, generating a staggering 622 million Spotify streams and counting.  Transferred From The Original Half-Inch Four-Channel Masters. Blu-ray With 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic And Hi-Res Stereo Mixes.
response.title: Doobie Bros. - Toulouse Street - Quadio Blu-Ray
